name: Small Island Survival
description:
Survival 3rd person shooter game for the weekly game jam theme Small Island. Enemies endlessly spawn and you have to kill them all. 

Controls:

Player Aims at the mouse pointer. Left Mouse button shoots, WASD to move, and P key to pause/unpause game (or use play button in the pause menu to unpause).

Edit: Walk animation broke near the end of my making this and it has something to do with the shoot animation and I don't have the time to fix it, unfortunately.
